Talon:

"relax, my friend"said Talon softly"Soon you will be in a Cr..."


=
From: Sandy 
Sent: Saturday, January 23, 2010 11:34 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogrou=
ps.com 
Subject: Re: The Old Maximal Base/Unicron's come back


  
While re=
sting as he was being tended to, Tucson forgets about the pain he is suffer=
ing as Talon stays beside him the entire time. He was very curious about Ta=
lon. She stayed by his side the entire time they were down on that base, an=
d she showed great concern when he locked himself up with Lamia and Nightst=
rike. She was even putting up with his antics which to many, was plain wrec=
klessness. 

" Talon, you're - still with me. I - don't think other femme b=
ots would - be able to put up with my unpredictable behavior like you have.=
 Don't - be alarmed, I've gotten to know you but, if - you don't mind, sinc=
e I can't see you, I - need my hands to - do that for me." 

With one hand,=
 Tucson gently feels Talon's face with a tenderness he had not expressed si=
nce meeting her and the others. He smiles and now gets an idea of what she =
may look like. Afterwards, he gently covers her hand with his own.

" I - w=
ish I could see you. My hands - tell me there's a - beautiful Maximal stand=
ing beside me, and I'd - really hate to miss it."
